title: Kelp Splat Charger
paragraphs: The Kelp Splat Charger is a main weapon in Splatoon. It is a Splat Charger with a different loadout, and some kelp attached to the rear. In Splatoon 2, it was converted into the Firefin Splat Charger.
The Kelp Splat Charger is nearly identical in appearance to the Splat Charger. However, the Kelp Splat Charger has a piece of kelp nailed to the right side of the ink tank.
The Kelp Splat Charger is in a set with Sprinklers and the Killer Wail.
- An Inkling wielding the Kelp Splat Charger in the test range.
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Kelp Splat Charger.
- Promotional art for Splatoon in Cologne, Germany, with a Splat Charger with the German flag on it.

- Both this weapon and the Bento Splat Charger were absent from Splatoon 2, likely in favor of the Firefin Splat Charger and Kensa Charger being the new second and third variants respectively for the Splat Charger.
Both remain absent from Splatoon 3, which features the Z+F Splat Charger and Splat Charger CAM-O as the second and third variants.
